channel.title: How to Make NO Quests
channel.description:
Okay I'm using DeltaScape and i was wondering how i delete all the quests on the server and take away the award such as i need to beat desert treasure to use ancient magiks and the lunar quests for lunar magiks.
Off Topic : When ever i pray at Lunar Altar (Object id is 410) it freezes i log back on and click on mage book it freezes... help? I'm using DeltaScape's Client v16

item.title: How to Make NO Quests
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

All you need to do is copy and paste a file from another client that already has lunars. LOL.

Read full topic

item.title: How to Make NO Quests
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Yes, The AgsPking or Pkerslyfe, both support Lunar, 100% to me. Lmao I love my work.

Read full topic

item.title: How to Make NO Quests
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

go to player.java sertch somthing that looks like
public int q1 ;
public int q2 ;
public int q3 ;
public int q4 ;
public int q5 ;
public int q6 ;
public int q7 ;
public int q8 ;
public int q9 ;
public int q10 ;
public int q11 ;

when u found that yust make it like this

public int q1 = 15;
public int q2 = 15;
public int q3 = 15;
public int q4 = 15;
public int q5 = 15;
public int q6 = 15;
public int q7 = 15;
public int q8 = 15;
public int q9 = 15;
public int q10 = 15;
public int q11 = 15;

greetz bountyleader
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2009, 08:57:11 am[/size][hr]+ u need a new client that holds lunar sertch for combattscape in sertchbar thats a client that u can use veng , or agspking client probly meny more .

Read full topic

item.title: How to Make NO Quests
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Version 16 does not support Lunar’s Magic, nor anything related to Lunar’s. If you’d like to delete the quests, open up every .txt file until you find one with the quests names etc. (I didn’t spoonfeed! :D) For your third problem, it’s all mostly in ClickingMost.java and Client.java…

Read full topic
